full_text: Bel u od Baie a oe ete 2017/KER/238 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE SUNIL THOMAS WEDNESDAY, THE 4TH DAY OF JANUARY 2017/14TH POUSHA, 1938 Crl.MC.No. 7815 of 2016 () AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN LP 16/2001 of J.M.F.C., PAYYANNUR CRIME NO.62/1993 OF PAZHAYANGADI POLICE STATION, KANNUR PETITIONER (S) /ACCUSED NO.3: SHAFI KALLITTA VALAPPIL, AGED 45 YEARS, S/O.MAHMOOD, KHADEEJAS', MATTOOL, KANNUR DISTRICT. BY ADVS.SRI.M.SASINDRAN SRI.P.K.SUBHASH RESPONDENT (S) /DEFACTO COMPLAINTANTS/STATE: 1. STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM 682 031. 2. KALLUVALAPPIL RAMACHANDRAN, AGED 45 YEARS, S/O.KUNHAPPA, MATTOOL AMSOM DESOM BIRIYANI ROAD, KANNUR DISTRICT, 670 001. 3. P.V.RAJAN, AGED 58 YEARS, $/O.KUNHIRAMAN, PAYYAN VALAPPIL HOUSE, MATTOL AMSOM, MATTOL SOUTH, NEAR MATTOOL VILLAGE OFFICE KANNUR DISTRICT 670 001. R1 BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SR.AMJAD ALI R2&3 BY ADV. SRI.S.R.SREEJITH THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04-01-2017, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Pisin) Pe ae C oe ae 2017/KER/238 Crl.MC.No. 7815 of 2016 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' EXHIBITS ANNEXURE Al A TRUE COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO.62/1993 ANNEXURE AIT A TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT ANNEXURE AIII A TRUE COPY OF THE JUDGMENT DATED 9/2/1998 IN C.c NO.360/1994 ANNEXURE AIV TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT SWORN TO BY THE 2ND RESPONDENT ENDORSING THE FACTUM OF COMPOUNDING OF THE SAID OFFENCES AND THE SETTLEMENT OF THE DISPUTES ANNEXURE AV TRUE COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT SWORN TO BY THE 3RD RESPONDENT ENDORSING THE FACTUM OF COMPOUNDING OF THE SAID OFFENCES AND THE SETTLEMENT OF THE DISPUTES RESPONDENT (S)' EXHIBITS : NIL /TRUE COPY/ P. A. TO JUDGE Pn 2017/KER/238 SUNIL THOMAS, J. Dated this the 4" day of January, 2017 ORDER The petitioner herein is the accused No.3 in Crime No.62/1993 of Pazhayangadi Police Station, Kannur for offences punishable under Sections 143, 147, 457, 380 read with Section 149 of IPC. 2. After investigation, final report was laid and the remaining accused faced the trial in C.C. No.360/1994. They were acquitted, evidenced by Annexure Alll judgment. The case against the petitioner herein was split up and refiled as C.C. No.76/1998. Since the accused remained absent, matter is now pending as L.P. No.16/2001. The petitioner contends that the matter has been settled between the parties and in the light of the settlement as well as Annexure Alll judgment, he is entitled for a relief and also to get the proceedings quashed. 3. Heard the learned Public Prosecutor who submitted that the matter has been settled between the parties and Annexure Alll is not under challenge in any other proceeding. Learned counsel for the contesting respondents relied on 2017/KER/238 Cri. M. C. No. 7815 of 2016 2 Annexures A IV & A V and submitted that the matter has been settled and they have no grievance against the petitioner herein. 4. In the light of the above, | am satisfied that, no purpose will be served by prosecuting the petitioner herein. In the result, Crl.M.C. is allowed. All further proceedings in Crime No.62/1993 of Pazhayangadi Police Station, Kannur stand quashed. Sd/- SUNIL THOMAS, JUDGE. Pn
